inn1.comm: first ball is defended to the off side
a bottom-handed thwack towards mid-on from Sharjeel
well outside off stump, moving away a touch, left alone
short of length ball closer to off, 125kph, slapped towards cover, good timing there but not as good placement
on the pads this time, eased to work that behind square leg, and Pakistan are away
well outside off and that is punched towards cover, a good-looking stroke that from Shehzad
starts with a length ball is unconvincingly worked towards mid-off
pitched up, 129.6 kph on off stump, Malinga from over the wicket to the right-hander, Shehzad pushes it back towards the bowler
pushed towards cover this time
shorter from Malinga, 130.8kph, on the stumps, defended towards mid-on
a full ball is clipped towards midwicket, Shehzad yet to get off the mark
short of length ball, defended towards mid-on
just a bit late to get his bat down on that one, inside-edge onto the pads and the ball rolls towards the off stump
length ball on the pads, defended back towards the bowler, a sedate start this from Pakistan
shorter this time, just outside off, sliced towards point by Sharjeel
full ball from Kulasekara, 128kph, mild lbw appeal as that one if kept out by Sharjeel
length ball around off stump, 127kph, pushed off the front foot towards extra cover

bowled 'im! Sharjeel was looking to whip that towards the leg side, this one swerved away a touch after pitching on middle and leg, crashes into the top of off as Sharjeel fails to connect, early breakthrough for SL here
length ball on the pads, Shehzad clips that towards deep backward square leg for a couple
blocked towards cover off the front foot
full ball is tucked towards square leg
too wide outside off, left alone
length ball is eased towards extra cover, they set off for a tight single, no direct hit so no problems
blocked back towards the bowler to end the over
Kule gets it to curve in after pitching outside off, very few surfaces in the world where he doesn't get it to dip in, defended from the crease to the off side
short of length ball outside off, muscled towards deep midwicket
short of length ball ducks in sharply, Hafeez hurried into defending that to the leg side
pitched up and that is gracefully drive towards sweeper cover for three
stylishly hit by Shehzad, too wide from Kulasekara and that is crashed past point for four, the first boundary of the innings
pitched up and closer to off, doesn't bounce much as the ball goes through to the keeper
length ball outside off, guided towards backward point
that one turns past the outside edge, Sangakkara takes the bails off, but Hafeez's back leg is in
short of length ball pitching just outside off, worked towards midwicket
skips down the track to reach the bounce and drives that firmly towards mid-off
on the pads this time, clipped behind square leg for a single
pushed off the front foot towards cover, Senanayake's first over is a good one
skips down the track, still can't reach the pitch, he was looking to power that down the ground, the bat twists as the ball rolls towards mid-on
short of length ball, 125kph, pushed towards cover this time
length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side
length ball on off stump, eased towards mid-on, four dot balls to start the over
a crisp drive sends the ball past extra cover but mid-off can get across to stop it, time enough to take a single
a loud appeal for lbw, again the batsman was looking to whip the ball to the leg side, that was around off stump, that looked high though, the umpire turns it down
skidding on after pitching just outside off, slapped off the back foot towards point
drifting away outside off, pushed off the back foot towards extra cover
length ball on middle and off, defended down the track
whipped behind square leg for a single
sweeps that towards deep midwicket for a single
shot! takes a couple of paces down the track and cracks that between the bowler and mid-off, that's four
this time Shehzad skips down the track, flat bats that shortish ball towards mid-on
pushed towards cover from the crease
there's more of what the fans want to see, short of length ball and that is launched by Shehzad for six over long-on
length ball around off stump, defended to the off side
a low full toss on off stump, squeezed towards wide mid-off a single
angling in towards the off stump, driven towards mid-on by Hafeez
driven off the back foot towards mid-on for a single
tossed up and that is down the leg side, Hafeez looks to sweep but misses
drags it short as the batsman steps out of the crease, slapped towards extra cover
down the leg side again, not a great strategy when the short leg is in, can't connect with the sweep, off the pads
full and outside leg once more, guided to short fine leg
another sweep, a more powerful one towards square leg, end of the Powerplay, 37 for 1
starts with a back of length ball, 130kph, punched towards cover
keeps it close to off stump, Hafeez again looking to get out of the crease, taps the ball towards the bowler
a touch shorter, on off stump, 132kph, flat batted towards the leg side, Pakistan batsmen string those together here, before going for the big hit
just outside off, jabbed towards mid-off, another dot ball
gets the single this time by punching the ball towards sweeper cover
beaten outside off, a footwork-free poke at a harmless delivery, past the bat and bounces before reaching Sanga, 132kph
first ball is blocked to the off side
a quick single after dabbing the ball towards backward point
length ball on middle stump, blocked off the front foot
full ball on middle, Shehzad looking for the big hit, changes his mind and defends
blocked off the front foot, four dots in this over as well
outside leg, Shehzad backs away and punches that towards mid-on for a single
Perera starts the second over with one of his usual delivery, short of a length and just outside off, steered towards deep backward point
length ball is pushed towards the bowler
too wide from Thisara, slapped towards sweeper cover by Hafeez
skips down the track and goes for the big hit, hit low on the bat but he got it straight of mid-off to get four runs
stylishly put away there, picked up off leg stump line and he didn't look to hit it too hard, Shehzad lifts the front leg as he helps that over square leg for four more
slapped towards cover for a single to end the over
a length ball is driven back towards the bowler
a touch shorter, eased towards long-on to bring up the 50 partnership
takes a couple of paces down the track and works this one to the leg side
spun away outside off, tapped towards sweeper cover
a leading edge there, Seekkuge gets some turn there, the ball rolls towards backward point
drops it quite short to counter the advancing batsman, defended towards the bowler
terrific shot that, Mathews drops it short outside off, powerfully punched off the back foot, past point for four
helped towards square leg for a single this time
slowr one, length ball well outside off, Hafeez adjusts and guides the ball to point
well outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
again the Pakistan dances down the track, again the ball is on the shorter side, drives that towards mid-off
down the leg side there from Mathews
pitched up and that is helped towards long-on for a single
full ball, makes room and defends
again on the fuller side, squeezed out towards point
spinning away after pitching on off stump, a bit of an edge as that dribbles towards backward point
on the pads, should have been an easy putaway, instead Hafeez can only tap it towards short fine
there's the big shot, gets on one knee and muscles that towards wide long-on, doesn't connect as well as he wanted, so it doesn't go all the way for six
defended towards mid-on
attempts a flamboyant shot but ends up edging it, he was looking to thrash that over cover, the ball flies down towards third man instead

an offcutter, coming in from short of a length, poked to the off side for a single, Hafeez starts off, then a bit of a stutter when they decide whether they want a single, they do and Hafeez sprints through
guided down towards third man for an easy single
short of length ball angling in towards the pads, worked to the leg side for one more, good over this so far for Pakistan
well outside off and that is slapped towards cover
back of a length ball just outside off, pushed towards mid-off, ends with a couple of dot balls
on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, a bit of flight as well, defended off the front foot
on middle stump, defended from the crease this time
backs away from the stumps and eases that towards extra cover for a single, four balls and just a single
fuller ball, eased towards midwicket for a single
Hafeez walks away towards the leg stump before Senanayake bowls, the bowler keeps it full and just outside leg, pushed back towards the bowler
an appeal for lbw, that was clearly going down leg and hit the batsman on the thigh pad as well, it was a straighter one from Seekkuge, it didn't turn as the batsman expected
pushed towards cover for one
dropped, that is a woeful miss from Malinga, as easy as they come at long-on, plenty of time to get in position, lands in his palms and goes through, Hafeez survives, just about
Shehzad celebrates that let-off by attempting the same shot, and boy has he connected well, showing Hafeez how it is done, that crashes into the sightscreen, salt meets wound
a single towards long-on for a single
waits on the backfoot and guides that behind backward point for a couple
pushed towards mid-on this time
defended from the crease
worked to the leg side for a single
pushed towards midwicket by Shehzad
a length ball on leg stump is swept towards square leg for a single, that brings up Shehzad's half-century off 57 deliveries
drags it short, swept towards deep midwicket
outside off, an edgy shot sends the ball towards backward point
nicely done there by Hafeez, waits for the ball and plays it late, guided down towards third man
on off stump, just a touch short, chopped towards backward point
pitched up this time, and he has clubbed that towards wide long-on for four, gets on one knee and powers that one
skips down and thumps that towards cover, a quick single is taken as Chandimal can't make a clean stop
waits on the back foot, don't look to power the ball, strokes it past point for four
length ball is defended to the right of the bowler
length ball, Shehzad skips down the track and drives that to the right of the bowler
an awkward shot, doesn't swing his arms fully as he whacks it towards wide long-on
flighted and full down the leg side
guides the ball in front of point for one more
back of a length and on the pads, eased towards midwicket for a single that brings up the 00 partnership, Pakistan have the foundations in place for a big score now
short of length ball, Shehzad skips down the track and launches that over extra cover
attempts a slower ball and that is way down the leg side
a shortish ball is pulled away towards deep square leg, 132kph, controlled shot for 2 from Hafeez, a diving stop by Chandimal
looking for a big shot but he can only hit it towards midwicket, not in the air
eased towards mid-on for an easy single
shortish ball outside off is pulled towards midwicket
short of length ball on off stump, Pakistan getting into a rhythm here, slapped towards point for one more
starts with a legstump length ball, worked behind square leg, quick single
gets on the back foot, backs away from the stumps and drives it towards long-on
length ball is eased towards midwicket
clipped towards deep midwicket for one more
full ball is swept superbly, made sure he placed it wide of Dimuth Karunaratne at deep square leg, but a good stop there, 35 for 0 in the last five overs
defended towards mid-on to end the over
well outside off, perhaps after spotting the batsman backing away
slanting in towards off stump, defended towards mid-on
pitched up, driven towards deep point for a single
short ball, doesn't deter Hafeez from charging out, and that is absolutely clubbed towards wide long-on, serious power on that flat-batted hit, a slower on from Mathews gets punished
chopped towards sweeper cover
well outside off, opens the face to help that along to third man
full ball outside off, defended to short cover
clipped off the pads behind square leg this time
length ball on the pads, defended off the front foot
pitched up and that is eased towards long-on for a single, there's Hafeez's half-century, he wasn't at his most fluent early on, but he has looked more settled as the innings progressed
fuller and around off stump, driven towards extra cover
short of length ball, Shehzad skips down the track and that is chipped towards long-on, not with too much power so it lands just outside the 30-yard circle
starts with a short of length ball, 130kph, slapped towards cover
driven towards long-on for a single, Pakistan cruising here
this was homing in on the base of off stump, easily kept out by Hafeez, works it towards midwicket
there's the yorker, 133kph toe-crusher, Hafeez planted his front foot forward then had to hastily try to get it out of the way, hit on the pads as that one tails away past leg stump

a flamboyant shot attempted by Shehzad, gutsy, he moved across the stumps and decided to paddle that towards fine leg, he misses it and flies off the back heel and over the keeper's head, that hit his leg outside the line of off or else there would have been a loud lbw appeal
full and chasing the batsman, off the pads to the leg side for a single, good over from Malinga, producing some moments of discomfort for the batsmen
length ball on leg stump, gets deep in the crease and whips it towards midwicket
shortish ball, Hafeez is down the track and he chops that towards point
Shehzad trying some fancy tricks here, well outside the stumps before the ball is bowled, looking to thrash that through the off side, misses
this time he slices it just past point for three, Karunaratne just about manages to stop that reaching the rope
whipped towards square leg for a single
Pakistan are switching gears, Shehzad mows this one from Seekkuge to cow corner for four to end the over
a 136.7kph yorker attempted, on middle stump, ends up as a low full toss, pushed towards long-on, batsmen were jogging a single, an overthrow conceded to make it a couple
of the pads to the leg side
full ball swinging in towards off stump, blocked off the front foot to the off side
full and outside off, eased towards cover for a single
length ball on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on
fullish ball on off stump, 136.5kph, whipped towards deep midwicket
a length ball is swept, and swept well, I thought it took the top edge but he has connected well enough to send that over the midwicket rope for six and bring up the 150 stand
looking to guide it to third man but misses
length ball on the pads, eased towards deep midwicket
short of length ball is worked towards midwicket
stays back and whips that towards wide long-on, Hafeez wanted two but is sent back
a lofted inside-out drive towards long-off for a single to end the over
length ball just outside off, driven crisply towards extra cover
full ball tailing in towards the batsman, squeezed towards backward point
a low full toss on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg for a couple
a high full toss this time, on the pads, down to short fine leg

wow, how incredible is this! Malinga after putting down the simplest of catches now pulls off a superb bit of fielding to break the big stand, Hafeez pushed this one to the right of Malinga, who moved across from his follow-through to collect the ball, he spotted that Shehzad is out of his crease, Shehzad was scrambling back but the throw from Malinga crashes into off stump, Shehzad is so short of the crease that the third umpire is not required, Shehzad wasn't helped by the fact that his bat got stuck in the turf as he tried drag his bat towards the crease
off the pads, looked to flick it but missed
smoked that one! Hafeez skips down the track and hammers that over the bowler's head for six, think that went on to the roof, an awesome hit from Hafeez
whipped off his pads in front of square leg for a single
length ball is defended back to the bowler by Maqsood
a length ball outside off, looking for a big drive, results in a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball is eased back towards the bowler
length ball on middle, pushed back to the bowler
full ball is driven towards long-on for a single
blocks this full ball, 135kph, back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, looking to drive that through the off, inside edge sends the ball to the leg side
a superb yorker from Malinga, on middle and leg, dug out to the leg side for a single
Malinga keeping it full, searching for the yorker once more, squeezed out towards backward point
length ball on off stump, punched towards cover, just three off the over, once more the batting Powerplay manages to cause problems for the batting team

nearly another run-out there, this time there was confusion in the calling, Hafeez works the ball to midwicket and sets off, then stops, before they decide to not go for the single, the throw is wide but Hafeez would have just made it back
defended to the off side this time
short of length and well outside off, driven back to the bowler, three dot balls to start the over
full and on the pads, whipped towards square leg, should have scored off that one
goes for the slower one, full ball is driven towards cover for the first run of the over

another run-out chance, what is going on out there? first an lbw appeal, then the ball rolls towards point, Maqsood sets off, Hafeez doesn't, Maqsood has some way to get back, the throw misses at the keeper's end, a direct hit and Maqsood would have been on his way
another tight run, pushed towards cover and they sprint through
back from the break with a wide
full ball on the pads is eased towards mid-on
Malinga searching for the yorker once more, pushed towards mid-on
good stuff this from Malinga, keeps it full, blocked back to the bowler, Maqsood 3 off 12 now
seeking the yorker once more, drops it a short, powered through covers for four, Malinga has his hands on his head
full and on off stump, squeezed towards backward point to end the Powerplay
on the pads, worked towards square leg for a single
full ball is eased towards mid-on for an ambled single
pushed towards deep midwicket
defended towards cover off the front foot this time
turned behind square leg for one more
drops it short, Maqsood skips down the track and taps the ball towards wide mid-on for one more
pitched up, goes for the big hit, he connects well, Maqsood comes down the track and clobbers that over long-on for a six
looking to whip that towards square leg, bottom edges it and the ball drops at his feet
six more! this was a full toss on the pads, poor delivery from Thisara, gets the treatment, whipped over square leg for six more
a yorker outside off, blocked to the off side
Maqsood has given it away here, a harmless length ball that he wanted to thump for six more, he ends up chipping it to Senanayake at long-on, 21 off 21, decent hand from Maqsood
final ball of the over is worked in front of square leg
Misbah brings out the reverse-sweep first ball, gets a single
down the leg side, clipped to Malinga at short fine

down the leg side, wide called, Misbah was shaping up for the reverse-sweep even before the ball was delivered, so the bowler and Mathews argue with the umpire whether it should have been called a wide
worked in front of square leg for a single
swept for one more in the same area
a loud lbw appeal, as Misbah looks to play a fine sweep, SL players thought that came off the thigh pad but umpire signals runs
tucked towards short fine leg for a single
another mix-up, length ball is clipped to Malinga at square leg, Hafeez takes a couple of paces, Misbah responds, then a loud shot of 'No,' Misbah has to turn back
defended back towards the bowler
well outside off, carved towards sweeper cover for two, a bit of hesitation before they decide on the second
shortish ball, Hafeez was down the track, pulled away towards fine leg
short of length ball is tipped towards Malinga, this time an early call for the single
length ball is defended to the off side
short ball just outside off, pulled away towards deep square leg, not timed properly, but there's still time to get two
full and wide outside off, scythes that through cover, again the timing isn't perfect, but enough of that shot to get four, it was a poor ball from Mathews, plenty of width for Misbah
drops it short once more, Misbah goes for the pull, a bottom-edge and the ball rolls towards the keeper, a single is scrambled
length ball is eased towards long-on for a single
full ball, angling in towards middle stump, 125kph, pushed towards long-on for an easy single
short of length ball outside off, whipped towards deep midwicket for one more
short of length and well outside off, stabbed behind point for four and he's now in the 90s
on off stump this time, eased to mid-on for a single
Misbah walks across the stumps even as Perera charges in, the ball is well outside off, Misbah looked to thwack that over the leg side but can't connect
full toss outside off, Misbah calls for the second after the ball is played to midwicket, could have been tight but Chandimal doesn't pick it up cleanly
full and well outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover for one more
length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
length ball just outside off, defended to the right of the bowler, Kule is onto that quickly cutting off thoughts of a single
length ball on off stump, guided towards backward point, and that another's dot ball
poor ball there from Kule, a knee-high full toss on the pads, perhaps thrown off by Misbah shifting around in the crease, Misbah then whips that behind square leg for four
mistimed as he looked to thump it through the off side, the ball rolled towards mid-on
whipped from off stump towards deep midwicket for a single
Kule misses the mark once more, another full toss on the pads, Misbah pounces, swings that away over the long leg boundary for six, 12 off the over
short of length ball on off stump, driven towards long-on
well outside off, Misbah looking to power that towards midwicket, doesn't connect

Misbah walks across the stumps, he's outside off before the ball is delivered, the ball is outside the wide guideline, but the umpire doesn't call it a wide given where Misbah was before the ball was delivered
full and well outside off, can't get bat on ball again
three dot balls? no problem for Misbah as he capitalises on this awaful full toss from Perera, hammered over long-on for six, huge hit from Misbah
a low full toss well outside off, drilled to long-on for a single
walks away from the stumps and thumps this towards midwicket
back of length ball outside off, guided down towards third man for a single, a misfield from Thisara Perera to allow the second
short ball is pulled down to fine leg, Hafeez on 99
Misbah is on fire here, making room, the bowler sends it outside off, Misbah gets on one knee and thrashes that towards the backward point boundary
whipped down to deep backward square leg, a dive at the rope keeps it down to two

Misbah was two paces outside leg stump before the ball was bowled, then he started moving towards the stumps, Kule bowls it short and at Misbah's body, Misbah is cramped up and can't do much with that one, through to the keeper
the yorker is spot on, Hafeez on 99 does well to get his bat down and block that to the leg side
there's the hundred for Hafeez, the second of the series, a length ball from Malinga is driven through cover for two, his 8th ODI century,  and he's been fluent after starting out a bit scratchily

superb hit from Hafeez, that was a low full toss, not easy to get under that one, Hafeez is well out of the crease as he connects with that, a cross-batted hit sends the ball screaming to the midwicket boundary
this was a half-volley from Malinga, thumped past a diving extra cover for four more
Malinga misses out on the yorker  for the third time in a row, Hafeez is in great touch here, he doesn't look to power this one, helped along to the long-leg boundary for four more
slower, 116kph, short of length and on off stump, guided towards backward point for a single
slower full one, on middle and leg, worked towards midwicket for a single

Misbah is gone! a great hand but it comes to the end with a tame shot, another poor ball from Perera, a hit-me full toss, a touch slower from Perera, Misbah could have slammed it where he wanted over the leg side, he can't connect properly and gives a catch to deep midwicket
Hafeez whacks this towards deep square leg to get a couple
short of length and well outside off, Hafeez tucks that towards deep backward square leg for a single
looking for a cute dab over the keeper's head, it was a short ball over the stumps, Afridi can't connect
short and just outside off, Afridi wanted to send that ball into orbit, badly mistimed, the ball rolls to the leg side and a single results
a yorker on target this time, just outside leg stump, Afridi hd made room, he pokes this towards point for a single
Hafeez attempts a seriously adventurous stroke, a sort of reverse-paddle, a full ball outside leg stump, he edges it onto his helmet, a wake-up call if any was needed
a low full toss on leg stump, worked towards midwicket for a single
short of length ball on middle stump, Afridi goes for the booming shot once more, he misses and that crashes into middle stump, Afridi is on his way

Malinga! now he's got Umar Akmal lbw first ball, hang on, referral, it was a full ball that Akmal wanted to block to the leg side, wasn't looking to play a fancy shot, and he survives, there was a thick inside edge onto his boot that saved him
rubbish ball to end the over, what was that? a high full toss well outside leg and that is thumped over the long-leg boundary
pitched up and that is driven towards long-on for a single, Hafeez now gets on strike
full ball is steered to third man for one more
superb hit from Akmal, mows that over midwicket for four, that was pitched up and Akmal thrashes that for a one-bounce four
back of the hand slower one from Kule, well outside off, Akmal wanted to crash that through the off side, can't connect
full ball is drilled towards long-on
this is poor bowling, full and down the leg side, easy to help along to the fine-leg boundary
looked to thump that out of the park, can't connect
short of length ball on off stump, tucked behind square leg for a single to bring up the 300
whoah, super shot from Hafeez, short-arm jab that has serious power, short of length ball sits up for Hafeez
this is even better from Hafeez, an awesome shot, he backs away and then steers this full ball past point for four, hardly any power needed to get that four
beautiful yorker from Malinga, Hafeez gets bat on it, edged onto his pads, a single scrambled
terrific yorker once more, blocked out for a single

superb hit from Akmal, and almost a stunning bit of fielding in the deep, Senanayake leaps to take that overhead at long-on, he was going to overbalance and go over the rope, so he tosses the ball up but he couldn't throw it onto the field, it is over the rope for six, though he collects it on his second attempt
towards mid-off for a single
pushed to mid-on for one more
wow, sensational hitting from Akmal here, swivels and deposits that ove rcow corner, it was a length ball, serious power there
full ball outside off, eased towards backward point for a single
looks to thump that to the leg side, off the pads towards point, Pakistan end on 326

inn2.comm: first ball is punched through the covers for a couple, Junaid started with a back of length ball well outside off
back of length ball, on off and middle, defended down the track
off offstump this time, blocked to the off side
Junaid has a loud lbw appeal, he's excited by anything that hits the pads, this was clearly going down the leg side
another huge lbw appeal, looked like a big bottom edge onto the pads, hit the top of the pads on the way to the keeper
short of length and just outside off, guided towards point for a single to let the over
first ball in nine month of international cricket is full and outside off, swing and a miss
full and well outside off, 134 kph, Perera chases it and connects well enough to launch it over covers
just outside off, pushed towards cover, a quick single
full ball outside off, a thick outside edge as Dilshan goes for it, down to third man for a single
short of length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side, 136.7kph from Gul
length ball on off stump, pushed back towards the bowler
shortish ball on middle stump, slammed towards the square-leg boundary, that one didn't get high enough to worry Dilshan
thumped past mid-off, powerfully driven by Dilshan, plants his front foot forward, and crashes that on the up
better ball, short of length, 139.7kph, just outside off stump, defended to the off side
another cracking stroke from Dilshan, can't get it past short cover though, that was a length ball, Perera had to put his skates on to complete the single
good bit of fielding from Sharjeel Khan at mid-on, this was another powerful drive, towards mid-on, Sharjeel had to move across to his left quickly to stop that one
a quick bouncer to end the over, 139.7kph, Dilshan leaves
an early wicket for Gul on his return, this was pitched up, and an uppish drive is well taken at backward point
the new man is Karunaratne, a bit higher than he batted last game, pitched up and that is driven towards mid-on
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards cover
back of a length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
two wickets in an over for Gul, he's got rid of Karunaratne here, this was angling across outside off, an outside edge through to the keeper, no feet at all as he wafted
shot! Sangakkara is something else, supreme drive through the covers for four, first ball too, no double-wicket maiden for Gul
slogs a short ball, badly mistimed and that rolls towards midwicket
the Dilscoop makes an appearance, it was a short of length ball, Dilshan ducks under and sends that over the keeper, Dilshan doesn't care that SL have lost two early
an appeal for caught-behind as Dilshan swishes at one outside off, he's beaten
pitched up and that is cracked off the front foot towards point, Dilshan going hard at everything, but that shouldn't surprise anyone
short of length ball outside off, no room for the cut, squeezed for room there, was looking for the powerhouse cut shot, changes to a more gentle dab
short of length and well outside off, another crisp hit towards point, straight at the fielders
pitched up and that is tucked towards midwicket
into the pads and that is helped along towards long leg
length ball on off stump, blocked towards the off stump
driven firmly on the up, that was just outside off
short of length ball on off stump, blocked to the off side
loud lbw appeal, that was pitched up and heading for the pads, it was heading down leg as well, so Pakistan don't go for the review
fuller ball on legstump, turned it towards midwicket
shortish ball is pulled away well in front of square, it was wide of long-on actually, a front-foot pull with awesome timing
another loud lbw appeal, umpire is unmoved, this one jagged in a quite a bit, hit high on the flap of the pads, no chance of it being out
short of length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
length ball around off stump, punched towards mid-off
short of length and outside off, defended to the off side
works it to midwicket
back of a length ball, punched towards mid-off
full ball outside off, eased towards point
short of length and just outside off, pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
red hot from Sanga, he steps out of the crease and launches that over long-on for six, not even one which he threw everything at
short ball angling across, Sanga wants to pulls this away but can't connect
shortish ball, 131.8kph, slammed behind square leg for a boundary
blocked to the off side
pitched up and on the stumps, driven towards mid-on off the front foot
short of length ball angling in towards middle and leg, defended off the front foot

the big one, Sangakkara is gone, he goes for the pull, he needed to get it right off the middle if he had to clear the man at deep midwicket, plenty of time for Maqsood to get under that one, can Sri Lanka come back form this blow?
worked towards square leg by Dilshan
length ball on off stump, pushed towards mid-on off the front foot
short of length ball just outside off, 131.5kph, Chandimal shoulders arms
a thick inside-edge onto the pads as he plays that one
into the pads, clipped towards square leg, just one off the over so far
run-our chance, length ball outside off, pushed towards extra cover, a direct hit and Chandimal was a goner, there isn't one and Chandimal dives through
short of length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
another big Junaid appeal for lbw, someone teach this man the rules of lbw, a huge inside edge there, doesn't stop Junaid from shouting like it was plumb lbw
good ball from Junaid, quick and slanting across outside off, thick outside edge as Chandimal pushes with no feet, down to third man
a bouncer, much too high
short of length and angling in, blocked to the off side
short from Junaid, easy for Dilshan, he pulled that away fiercely behind square leg for four to bring up Sri Lanka's 50
length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
on the pads, eased towards mid-on from the crease
squeezed out towards square leg
heading for middle, makes room and pushes that towards cover
on the pads, 101.7kph, worked to square leg
gets back in the crease and flashes that past backward point for four, nicely done by dilshan
pushed towards cover by Dilshan to end the over
length ball is defended off the front foot towards cover

another run-out chance, Chandimal survives, he clipped the ball towards deep midwicket and took a single, wanted two, dilshan also did initially, just when Chandimal started sprinting, Dilshan sent him back, luckilyfor chandimal the throw was wide
defended back towards the bowler

full and outside off, driven towards sweeper cover, should have been only two, Sohaib Maqsood tried to stop that with his feet, awkward technique and he is nutmegged, could have injured himself as well, seemed to be trying a scissors kick as he slid near the rope
defended back towards the bowler
shortish and outside off, slapped towards backward point
a massive appeal for lbw as Afridi gets the ball to spin in, inside-edge onto the pads
skids on outside off, tapped towards point
shortish ball, punched towards long-off for a single
makes room and looks to send that past short third man, that was uppish as he threw his bat at a ball just outside off
helped towards cover for a single
on the pads, clipped behind square leg for a single
short of a good length ball, turned to square leg
drops it short, Dilshan wants to murder that one, can't time it as the ball rolls towards midwicket
short of length ball on off stump, blocked to the off side, a quick single is taken
short of length  ball on off stump, squeezed out towards backward point
length ball, punched towards cover off the front foot
on off stump, a bottom-edge sends the ball to the off side, Chandimal wants a single, Bhatti is quickly onto the ball
slides on to the pads, whipped towards square leg
skips down the track, inside-edge onto the pads
length ball on off stump, eased towards cover off the front foot
squeezed down to third man for a single
backs away and looks to steer that past short third man, can't beat the man
full and on the pads, pushed towards mid-on
short of length ball is defended towards the off side
throws his bat at that one, length ball is drilled towards mid-on
short of length and outside off, defended towards point for a single
pummels that towards deep midwicket, Sharjeel Khan makes a dive near the rope to cut that off, earns some applause from Afridi for his effort
this edge as he looked to on-drive that one, bounces into his back pad
swishes at that one outside off and misses
full ball is swept from around off stump, behind square leg
length ball on off stump, turning away, poked behind point
that's a wide from Afridi
pitched up and eased towards long-off for a single
on the pads, tucked towards square leg for a single
slides on after pitching on off, played off the back foot towards point
bit of width, slapped towards point, not placed properly
length ball on the pads, whacked towards deep square leg, just a single
shortish ball angling in towards the pads, clipped towards deep square leg
on off stump, doesn't rise too much after bouncing back of a length, slapped towards points
very wide outside off, not called a wide, Chandimal isn't amused by the umpire's call
slashes that down towards Junaid at third man
Dilshan goes for the Dilscoop but that was too far outside off and away from his body to connect
first ball is defended to the off side
length ball is eased towards mid-on for a single
length ball on off stump, blocked off the front foot
blocked towards midwicket off the front foot
spinning away after pitching just outside off, slapped towards deep point
length ball just outside off, cracked through extra cover for four by Dilshan, terrific shot to bring up his half-century
short of length and angling in, blocked towards cover
Dilshan wanted to launch that out of the ground, thick inside-edge onto the pads
144kph from Bhatti, that was short and wuick, sadly for him down the wrong line, down leg side
short ball, Dilshan is in position early, slams that past midwicket for four, great connection and that flies to the boundary
less great from Dilshan this time, but same number of runs, a full ball outside off, Dilshan looks to thread it through the off side, outside edge and past the keeper for four
Dilshan is going all guns blazing here, every ball he is looking to thrash to the boundary, this one he can only get as far as the midwicket fielder
pitched up and on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
length ball on off stump, gets on the front foot and eases it towards cover
seemed to be a poor ball, it was very short but it stayed lower than Dilshan expected, he was shaping to thrash that to the leg side, it sneaks under his bat and crashes into the top of middle
length ball heading for leg stump, inside-edged towards square leg
pretty short and that is flatbatted to long-on
length ball is driven off the front foot towards mid-off
143kph, short of length and outside off, reared up outside off
beaten outside off, looking to drive on the up, that was well outside off, short of length
Mathews needs to compose himself here, three times he hasn't managed to get bat on ball, this was the worst of the lot as he looked to crash this over mid-off, beaten
short of length ball on off stump, tucked towards deep midwicket
elegantly done, overpitched outside off and that is eased through covers for four, great drive from Chandimal
overpitched once more, again sweet timing from Chandimal, last time there was power in his drive, this time it was all touch, the ball speeds past mid-off for four
pushed towards extra cover for a single
worked towards mid-on, uppishly played there
pushed back towards the bowler
flighted ball from Afridi, defended to the leg side
pitching on off and turning away, defended behind point
inside-edge onto the pad as he looks to power that through mid-off
length ball slanting down the leg side, easy to help along to the fine-leg boundary
quicker one, fuller and outside off, blocked to the leg side
length ball on middle and leg, clipped behind square leg
short of length and just outside off, defended from the crease
on middle and off, defended to the leg side
huge appeal for lbw but that was slanting down the leg side
skips down the track and thrashes that past extra cover for four, inside-out drive and Chandimal looking in good touch now
defended to the right of the bowler
overpitched and just outside off, eased towards mid-on
length ball is driven through cover for a single
full ball is squeezed towards square leg for a single
down the leg side, Mathews should have done better than tapping that to square leg
length ball is blocked off the front foot to the leg side
shortish ball on off stump, clipped behind square leg
on the pads once more, nurdled towards deep square leg
outside off, Mathews looks to carve that through the off side and misses, that was a doosra
pushed towards point for a single to end the over
length ball on the leg stump, clipped towards square leg
length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
skips down the track and tucks that towards midwicket, good diving stop from Anwar Ali
full ball is defended towards midwicket

no half-century this time as well for Chandimal, after 44 and 46, he's gone for 36 today, he wasn't near the pitch of the ball though he came down the track, still decided to go for the big shot, perhaps because of the three dot balls that preceded, he slices it high and towards deep midwicket, Maqsood takes the catch, Sri Lanka are five down, the day just gets better and better for Hafeez
length ball on off stump, nudged towards square leg
length ball on off stump, defended
spinning in towards off, worked in front of square leg
defended off the front foot towards extra cover
another dot ball, towards midwicket this time, asking rate is now 9
spinning in towards the pads, looking to work it to the leg side but is hit on the pads
a touhc short and on the pads, Kule should have got some bat on that, off the pads behind square leg
full ball outside off, blocked down the track
spinning in, clipped off the back foot towards square leg
short of length and spinning in, defended from the crease
towards midwicket for a single, bounces extra off the unused pitches and that's why Afridi couldn't stop it cleanly first time conceding the single
swept behind square leg for a single
defended to end the over, Kule is now 1 off 9, how long before the big shot comes?
looking to pull that one away, off the thigh pad and balloons up
the doosra, superb from Ajmal, Mathews had no idea, that pitched just outside off, Mathews not sure which way it will turn, hangs out his bat and is beaten
clipped to the leg side for a single
blocked back towards the bowler this time

there's the wicket, Kualsekara was having a tough time out there, this was well outside off, Kulasekara looked to drive away from the body, gets a thin inside-edge and Umar Akmal takes a sharp low catch, well done Akmal, and that also means Ajmal breaks the Pakistan record for most international wickets in a year with 102, beating Saqlian Mushtaq in 1997
beaten outside off, an appeal for caught behind to end a successful over

length ball is pushed towards cover and they take a tight single, Akmal takes off the bails and they are going to the third umpire, needed a direct hit there, Thisara dives in before Akmal breaks the stumps
on the pads, tucked behind square leg for a single
full ball on the pads, worked towards deep midwicket
looks to paddle sweep that one, down to short fine leg
full ball and that is blocked to the leg side
goes for the big heave, bottom edges it towards fine leg for four
defends off the front foot to the leg side
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards deep point
length ball and that is thrashed over long-off for six, Sri Lanka needs plenty of these if there are compete in this one
round the wicket now, outside off, and that is poked towards point
that is much too good for Prasanna, ripper of a delivery, that one is a doosra that whizzes away after pitching around middle, beaten
tucked towards square leg for a single to end the over
swept firmly and that is away for four, good hit
full ball is clubbed over the bowler's head for six, Prasanna doesn't move out of the crease after playing that, he was sure that was clearing long-on

big lbw appeal, umpire turns it down, Pakistan consider whether to review, they don't, they should have, that was [pitching on leg stump, hitting the pad of middle and would have crashed into the stumps
thick inside edge onto the pads, mild lbw appeal
another one, but the ball was slipping down leg side

Seekkkuge is gone, a short of length ball on the pads, Seekkuge gets on one knee and looks to power that to the square leg boundary, connects well but not well enough to clear ajmal on the boundary, an overhead catch is taken and the SL innings continues to disintegrate, and that ends one of the most action-packed overs in a long time
worked towards midwicket
a massive six, Mathews skips down the track and thumps that one with the turn, not just over wide long-on, or the ropes behind him, or even the stands behind that, it is out of the park
defended off the front foot
slides on outside off, chopped towards deep point for a single
spinning past the outside edge as Perera looks to defend off the front foot
length ball on off stump is defended off the front foot
full ball on the pads, defended off the front foot
length ball on middle and leg, pushed back towards the bolwer
a full toss on the pads, Mathews whips that over midwicket for six, for a moment Hafeez thought the man in the deep had a chance but that was way over that fielder's head
defended towards midwicket
pitched up, off the back foot and driven towards extra cover
six more from Mathews, he knows there's only one gear to use if Sri Lanka are to get near Pakistan's total, mowed that over midwicket, that went very high but had the legs as well to clear the rope
on the pads, clipped towards square leg for a single
quicker and on middle stump, worked to the leg side
fuller ball, defends it to the off side
the doosra, Mathews wanted to slam that out of the park again, he misses and Umar Akmal also misses and is struck on the body
quicker, flatter and full, on off stump, eased towards mid-off
just two off the over as Perera pokes the final ball towards point
shortish ball, looks to thumps that over long-on with a flat bat, miscued towards mid-on, Mathews was a bit late on that shot

that's the end of Perera, Afridi has a long way to go to pluck that skier, it was a top edge from Perera, that went miles up in the air over the keeper's head, the keeper runs back but he can't get there in time, Afridi can, takes it and then pulls out the starfish celebration to show how much he enjoyed it

huge appeal for lbw, this is a Junaid appeal though, looked to be high, turned down, Pakistan , Mathews was looking to pull that one and had his front leg off the ground, was struck outside the line and that was hitting him over the knee roll, high and wide, no scope of an lbw, but when you already have 8 wickets, might as well use it
length ball on middle stump, clipped toward midwicket
length ball on off stump, inside-edged towards the leg side
short of length ball outside off, 139.6kph, batsman is beaten by that one

run-out?, goes for the reverse-sweep, has to wait for a while before the ball arrives, he can't get it away with the power he wanted, towards point, and Bhatti fires in the return, Senanayake put in a full-length dive to make his ground just in time, direct hit and he was gone
spinning in towards the pads, defended to the leg side
on the pads, sent out towards deep midwicket
guides this wide of slip for a single
short of length and on off stump, pushed towards extra cover

who is going to catch that? surely the keeper's catch, Hafeez also wants it, the keeper calls for it and takes it, Hafeez is not happy for some reason, in any case Mathews is gone, it was a doosra from Ajmal, Mathews wanted to slog that over midwicket, top edges it and it swirls towards square leg, SL are nine down
full ball on the stumps, batsman gets the bat in the way in time, ball rolls to the offside
length ball on leg stump, pushed towards mid-on
a waft outside off from Malinga, beaten
back of length ball on leg stump, defended to the off side

pings in the yorker, Malinga gets his bat down and gets a thick outside edge, bounces just past the off stump, Akmal dives to field that and gets a glove on it but can't stop it, seems to have hurt his fingers as well
another yorker, this time on legstump, Malinga goes deep in the crease and keeps that out
spinning in towards the pads, defended unconvincingly
doosra, beats the bat outside off,big turn there for Ajmal
defended from the crease towards point
back of a length ball is uppishly played towards long-off
dropped, a top edge as the doosra from Ajmal, Malinga wnated to slam that over midwicket, thick edge and Akmal can't hang on
here's another chance, Malinga skews this one over cover, Bhatti has a way to go to get under it, he gets there but he can't clasp the ball, Malinga fights on
Malinga moving away from the stumps as Junaid fires it in, wafts at it and misses
short of length ball into leg stump, 140kph, Malinga blocks it unconvincingly
slower ball on offstump, 107kph, defended to the off side
length ball into the pads, clipped behind square leg for a single
short ball, Senanayake ducks under that one
he does bowl it fast and full, Senanayake jams his bat down in time to keep that out
scythed that through the covers to take Sri Lanka past 200
looking to skip down the track, can't get bat on it
wild mows the order of the day now, no contact outside off
a doosra, played uppishly towards cover, lands short of the fielder there, SL prolonging this
tries to slog and misses
tries to slog and misses
full ball on off stump, defended to the off side
off the toe end of the bat to the off side
slaps it to point where a misfield allows the ball to run away for four, Sharjeel makes the mistake
looks to thump that over the off side, the ball rolls tamely towards the bowler
connects properly this time and another boundary through the cover
full and on leg stump, driven down to long-on for a single
starts with the bouncer though, Malinga ducks under
there's the yorker, between the bowler and the stumps
short of length ball, looks to mow that but misses, struck on the body

game over, good return game for Gul, he finishes it off with a full ball that crashes into the stumps, three dots and the fourth one takes out the stumps, completes a dominant performance from Pakistan
